abstract: Ten people are killed in building fire in Abu Dhabi, capital of United Arab Emirates.
lead_paragraph: The police in Abu Dhabi, the capital of the United Arab Emirates, are investigating a fire that tore through a building in an industrial area where laborers were sleeping and killed 10 people.

headline.main: United Arab Emirates: Police Investigate Deadly Fire
headline.print_headline: United Arab Emirates: Police Investigate Deadly Fire

snippet: The police in Abu Dhabi, the capital of the United Arab Emirates, are investigating a fire that tore through a building in an industrial area where laborers were sleeping and killed 10 people.
